narrative.title: Brescia Division - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: Italian Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.objectives: Static defensive infantry division deployed in prepared fortifications along Tobruk-Bardia defensive line
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain and rocky desert near Tobruk-Bardia sector

special_rules: Integration with German Afrika Korps units
